description: Lily Shiraishi is president of the Constan Magical Academy Student Council, and is, as such, Sai Akuto`s superior in his capacity as part of the Disciplinary Committee. She is always seen wearing a pointed witch`s hat, and possesses significant magical power. She is the first girl to actually kiss Akuto, and appears to have romantic feelings for him as well.
name: Lily Shiraishi
